attributes.action: Please make the amendments needed to law to bring about a snap general election.
attributes.additional_details:
The tory party torn apart on their views and if they can't stand unified on an important front, that doesn't look good for us as we take a step forward in to the unknown

The country should get a say who takes them forward I to this new uncertain future as the country has lost confidence in its government.

Please make the amendments needed to the law to bring about a snap general election.
attributes.background:
Please make the amendments needed to law to bring about a snap general election.

Britain has voted out of the EU and an uncertain future lays ahead for the citizens of Britain. 

.
